heading: This Afternoon
text: A few light snow showers; blowing snow.
temperature: Falling, from the single digits to mid teens north, mid teens to around 20 south

heading: Tonight
temperature: Zero to 15 below north, 5 below to 5 above south

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly sunny. Chance of a mountain snow shower after noon.

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of an early snow shower northern mountains.
temperature: Low to mid teens north, upper teens to mid 20s south
